# How I Use AI Tools Personally
> Site by Joe Hu (https://hubeiqiao.com)

## Current: January 2026
My Claude Code Workflow: How a Product Person Ships Real Products
- Document First: Write what you want before AI coding
- Context Window: Manage the 200K token limit
- Manual Testing: Your taste matters
- Debugging: Act like a PM, provide evidence

URL: https://ai.hubeiqiao.com/

Comprehensive AI tools overview covering document analysis, slide decks, diagrams, prototypes, video generation.
